content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### No structures have been successfully created or updated.

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placement. Check for any obstructions at the target location.

### Boiler is not receiving water
- Verify that all necessary pipes are correctly connected to the boiler to ensure water flow. Check for any disconnections or blockages in the pipeline.

### Steam engine not connected to the power network
- Ensure that the steam engine is properly connected to the power network. Check for any missing or misaligned power poles and ensure all connections are secure.
